title: Stocks in cautious ranges ahead of China data, trade talk hopes fade

title: Reuters poll: Trade truce unlikely in 2020 but U.S. recession fears recede - economists

title: Fed's Powell takes old-school view on U.S. borrowing capacity

title: Dow, S&P 500 notch record closes even as U.S.-China trade concerns dampen gains
text: U.S. stocks largely closed in positive territory Wednesday, though off session highs, after the Wall Street Journal reported that U.S.-China trade talks have stalled out on disagreements over China making firm commitments on agricultural purchases and U.S. reluctance to roll back already implemented tariffs in the hopes of maintaining an enforcement mechanism to hold China to the terms of a potential deal.
